text: The National Museum of History of Azerbaijan () is the national museum of history of Azerbaijan. It is the largest museum of Azerbaijan. It is in Baku, in the former mansion of Azerbaijani oil magnate and philanthropist Haji Zeynalabdin Taghiyev. It was founded in 1920. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:National museums in Asia Category:Buildings and structures in Baku Category:1920 establishments in Azerbaijan Category:Museums in Azerbaijan
title: National Museum of History of Azerbaijan
